name: Ukie Green Jam 2019: Clean Our World
name_original: Ukie Green Jam 2019: Clean Our World
description:
UKIE Green Games Jam 2019 Submission: 

Warning: Do not open T-Bucks shop before pressing resume! 

We made this game to spread awareness about the concerning amount of litter in our eco-system. It’s a pressing issue and we wanted to make an interactive media form for people to see this in a new perspective. We want the players to grow to care about the animals we’ve created, much like they would care about animals in the real world and to want to save them to inspire positive change within our world. 

Credits: 

Kyle Hughes - Producer/Lead Designer, 3D Art, textures, PR and UI Design 

Cameron Platten - Level Design, Animation, Cinematic and Sound design 

Oliver Watts - 3D Art, Character Art, Texture and animation 

Jamie - Programming, Engine Design, AI development and UI Design 

Alexander Greatorex - AI Programming and Programming
